aboutPreview.title: About Me
aboutPreview.description: A passionate Full-Stack Developer with over 3 years of experience crafting digital experiences

content.intro: I am a dedicated software developer based in Cameroon, specializing in creating modern web applications and scalable backend solutions. My journey in tech began with a curiosity for how things work on the internet, and it has evolved into a professional passion for building impactful digital solutions.
content.expertise: With expertise in React.js, Next.js, Node.js, and various databases, I bring ideas to life through clean, efficient code. I'm particularly passionate about creating user-friendly interfaces and robust backend architectures.
content.approach: I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest technologies. Whether working independently or as part of a team, I'm committed to delivering high-quality solutions that make a difference.

aboutPreview.passionStatement: Passionate about turning ideas into reality
aboutPreview.techStackPreview: Some technologies I work with daily

bachelor.title: Bachelor's Degree in Engineering
bachelor.description: Specializing in Software Engineering with a focus on web technologies and system administration. Expected graduation in 2025.

gce.title: GCE Advanced Level
gce.description: Completed A-Levels with excellent grades (GPA 4.0), focusing on Mathematics, Physics, and Computer Science.

[0].description: Developing responsive portfolio websites using React and Node.js for various clients. Implementing custom solutions and ensuring exceptional user experiences.

[1].description: Working with a team to develop and deploy educational websites using the MERN stack. Currently maintaining and improving the platform based on user feedback and analytical insights.

[2].description: Gained hands-on experience in backend development and software testing, focusing on creating scalable and secure web applications. Built a robust property management system with features like tenancy agreements, maintenance requests, and online rent payments.

[3].description: Worked as a Frontend Developer and Designer using Next.js, developed and documented a delivery web application utilizing technologies like TypeScript, Next.js, Bootstrap, and Tailwind CSS.

[4].description: Enrolled in projects and tasks involving Frontend Development, such as Payment Gateway and electronic wallet applications, Mobile Development, and some SEO optimization work.

heading.title: About Me
heading.name: Nkengbeza Derick
heading.subtitle: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with a strong foundation in web development and a growing interest in system administration and data management.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.description: Discover more about my background, skills, and what drives me as a developer.

story.paragraph1: My journey into the world of software development began with a simple curiosity about how websites work. That curiosity quickly blossomed into a deep passion for creating digital experiences that solve real-world problems.
story.paragraph2: With over 3 years of experience in web and backend development, I've had the opportunity to work on a diverse range of projects, from educational platforms to property management systems. Each project has taught me valuable lessons and helped me refine my skills.
story.paragraph3: Currently pursuing my Bachelor's degree in Engineering at the University of Buea, I'm constantly seeking to expand my knowledge and stay at the forefront of technological advancements. My academic background provides me with a strong foundation in problem-solving and analytical thinking, while my practical experience allows me to implement effective solutions.
story.paragraph4: As a full-stack developer, I specialize in building responsive, user-friendly web applications using modern frameworks like React.js, Next.js, and Express.js. I have a strong understanding of REST API design and am proficient in both SQL and NoSQL databases.
story.paragraph5: Beyond web development, I'm also developing expertise in system administration and data management, as I believe these skills are crucial for creating comprehensive, scalable solutions.
story.paragraph6: I'm driven by the belief that technology should be accessible and beneficial to everyone. This philosophy guides my approach to development, where I prioritize clean code, intuitive user interfaces, and robust functionality.

card.description: I'm a full-stack developer passionate about creating elegant solutions to complex problems. With expertise in web and mobile development, I strive to build applications that are both functional and visually appealing.

faq.subtitle: Common Questions
faq.description: Here are answers to questions I'm often asked. If you don't find what you're looking for, please don't hesitate to contact me directly.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

1.question: What services do you offer?
1.answer: I specialize in full-stack web development, offering frontend, backend, and database solutions. My services include responsive website development, web application creation, API development, system administration, and more.

2.question: What is your typical project process?
2.answer: My project process typically includes requirement gathering, planning, design, development, testing, and deployment. I maintain regular communication throughout to ensure your vision is being realized according to your expectations.

3.question: How do you handle project pricing?
3.answer: Project pricing depends on complexity, timeline, and specific requirements. I offer both hourly rates and fixed-price quotes based on the project's scope. I'm happy to provide a detailed proposal once I understand your needs.

4.question: Can you work with existing codebases?
4.answer: Yes, I'm experienced in working with existing projects and codebases. I can analyze, refactor, optimize, or extend existing applications regardless of whether I was involved in their initial development.

5.question: Do you offer maintenance services after project completion?
5.answer: Absolutely! I provide ongoing maintenance and support services to ensure your applications continue to run smoothly. This includes bug fixes, security updates, performance optimizations, and feature additions as needed.
